/**
 * \page page_mediadescription Media Description Example
 *
 * Implements an example program that writes and reads DAT Files with the help of the media description language.
 * Remember to run this example on windows the streaming lib dll must be in yout path.
 * 
 * For detailed information on DDL see also @ref page_ddl_specification.
 * 
 * \par Location
 * \code
 *    ./examples/mediadescription/
 * \endcode
 *
 * \par This example shows:
 * \li how to create streams with a media description
 * \li how to get the media description of a streams
 * \li how to process DAT Files with the help of the media description
 * 
 * \par The Implementation for the Media Description Example
 * \include mediadescription.cpp
 *
 */
